entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 1:43 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
